title: Process a Player Fine
description: A player has been fined by the league for criticizing officials in a post-game interview. An agent must process the fine.

tasks.description: Retrieve the disciplinary report detailing the fine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the player has been fined $10,000.

tasks.description: Notify the player's team of the fine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal notification to the team.

tasks.description: Arrange for the fine to be automatically deducted from the player's next paycheck.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the payroll deduction.
